method: Prick the tough skin of the sloes all over with a clean needle and put in a large sterilised jar. Pour in the sugar and the gin, seal tightly and shake well. Store in a cool, dark cupboard and shake every other day for a week. Then shake once a week for at least two months. Strain the sloe gin through muslin into a sterilised bottle.
ingredients: 450g/1lb sloes,  225g/8oz caster sugar,  1 litre/1¾ pint gin
